attributes.additional_details:
I would like to urge the UK government to stop releasing propaganda regarding the crisis in Ukraine and start telling the truth.

Its fact that the outing of the elected president Viktor Yanukovych was actually due to the EU and its expansionist policies. The current government have been put in place by the USA and EU and the East of Ukraine do not recognise it and now are being bombed by Kiev!

Stop following the USA foreign policies and help deplomatically!
